seller_description: Product details: MaterialYellow Gold, Metal type: Yellow Gold, Back Finding: Latch Back, Earring design: Hoop, Gem type: No Gemstone, Item type name: Earrings. About this item: These double huggie hoop earrings are have two different patterned hoops that measure 28mm long when linked together. Level up your ear stack with these Dangle Link Earrings that are crafted with 14K Yellow Gold Plating for long lasting brilliant finish. 60-DAY GUARANTEE Your happiness is our number one priority. To ensure your complete satisfaction, we offer a hassle-free 60-Day money-back guarantee. To get in touch, email or chat with us - a member of our team will be happy to help you. SUSTAINABILITY PAVOI is dedicated to sustainability throughout our entire product cycle. Our jewelry is made from 100  recycled materials and we package in 99  recycled and compostable materials. We work to reduce our carbon emissions and offset plastic consumption by removing 275,000 bottles from oceans annually. We are committed to maintain a balanced and eco-friendly business that minimizes our environmental impact. Trust that PAVOI is continuously working towards a greener future. PROUDLY AMERICAN-OWNED
review: Elegant. Perfect size for me. Yellow gold looks richly in life
expected-output: Seller's Description Analysis The seller describes these earrings as: Made from 14K yellow gold plating, crafted with two linked hoops, each with a different pattern. Designed as double huggie hoop earrings with a length of 28mm when linked. Back finding type is a latch-back for secure wearing. Marketed as sustainable jewelry made from 100% recycled materials, reflecting the brand's commitment to eco-friendly practices. Backed by a 60-day guarantee, ensuring customer satisfaction with a hassle-free return policy. Buyer's Review Analysis The buyer is satisfied with the earrings, describing them as: Elegant and perfectly sized, aligning well with their preference. The yellow gold finish appears rich in real life, suggesting that the quality and finish met the buyer's expectations. Image Comparison and Discrepancies Seller's Image: The earrings appear to be a rich yellow gold color with a polished, high-quality finish. The design looks elegant and sophisticated, with two hoops linked together as described. Buyer's Image: The buyer’s image confirms the yellow gold appearance and showcases the earrings being worn. The earrings look to be of high quality with a shiny finish, consistent with the seller’s image. The size and style also match, with the earrings fitting well and appearing similar in both images. Conclusion The product aligns well with the seller's description and meets the buyer's expectations. The buyer’s review is positive, noting that the earrings are elegant and the gold color is rich in appearance, which supports the seller’s quality claims. There are no discrepancies between the description, seller's images, and buyer's experience. " Neither the buyer nor the seller is at fault; the product aligns well with the seller's description, and the buyer is highly satisfied with the quality, appearance, and style of the earrings, indicating a successful purchase that meets expectations.
